channel.title: 7 Run Server Error's

item.title: 7 Run Server Error's
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

Heres the thing, if you read the errors thoroughly, it talks about “max NPC’s spawned” This means you overloaded the autospawn.cfg file

Also, you will need too updates the max npc’s spawned, it will be in npchandler.java

Read full topic

item.title: 7 Run Server Error's
item.dc:creator: @MrPurple436648 MrPurple436648
item.description:
@MrPurple436648 wrote:

But the wierd thing is, the error’s only happen when i start it up on my VPS. It the same source files and everything, just uploaded. Ill start it up not on VPS, works just fine. Then i get those error’s on my VPS.

Read full topic

item.title: 7 Run Server Error's
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

You might have done something wrong in npc.cfg or npcdrops.cfg. make sure you tabbed everything and such

Read full topic

item.title: 7 Run Server Error's
item.dc:creator: @MrPurple436648 MrPurple436648
item.description:
@MrPurple436648 wrote:

This is all of them:

Server.java:42: cannot find symbol
symbol: class NPCHandler
location: class server
public static NPCHandler npcHandler = null;

Player.java:571: cannot find symbol
symbol: variable NPCHandler
location: class player
public final static int maxNPCListSize = NPCHandler.maxNPCSpawn;

Player.java:740: cannot find symbol
symbol: variable NPCHandler
location: class Player
public byte npcInListBitmap[] = new byte (NPCHandler.maxNPCSpawns +7 >> 3];

Player.java:740: operator + cannot be appilied to NPCHandler.maxNPCSpawns,int
public byte npcInListBitMap[] = new byte ((NPCHandler.maxNPCSpawm+7 >> 3];

Player.java:740: operator >> cannot be appliet to , int
public byte npcInListBitMap[] = new byte [(NPCHandler.MaxNPCSpawns + 7 >> 3];

PlayerHandler.java:409: cannot find symbol
symbol: variable NPCHandler
location: class playerhandler
for (int i = 0; i <NPCHandler.maxNPCSpawns; i++> {

Server.Java:111: cannot find symbol
Symbol: class NPCHandler
Location: Class server
npcHandler = new NPCHandler<>;

7 errors
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
Caused by: Java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server
at java.net.URLClassLOader$1.run(Unkown Source)
at java.security.acessController.DoPrivilged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.lodclass(unknown source)
at sun.misc.launcher$appclassloader.loadClass(Unkown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.LoadClass (Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: server. Program wILL exit

Got any tips?

Read full topic
